list_definition.definition: (of) any of a group of substances, usually shiny, that can conduct heat and electricity and can be hammered into shape, or drawn out in sheets, bars etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Gold, silver and iron are all metals.

list_definition.definition: (of) a combination of more than one of such substances

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Brass is a metal made from copper and zinc.
